name: Somali Music
description: Music developed by the Somali people.

children.name: Belwo
children.description: Somali poems with themes of love and romance and brief, syncopated tunes.

children.name: Dhaanto
children.description: Song and dance that originally featured no instruments, but later transformed into a style featuring prominent rhythms and slow grooves.

children.name: Qaraami
children.description: Dates back to the 1940s and carries regional features such as the use of a pentatonic scale and having the oud as the primary instrument.
